title: The Matrix
author: Donna Connelly
body: An excellent movie with tons of special effects, fight scenes, etc., and the best thing is that they are all done perfectly. A really good film with an interesting story behind it. YOU'LL ENJOY IT.

annotated_sentences.text: An excellent movie with tons of special effects, fight scenes, etc., and the best thing is that they are all done perfectly.
A really good film with an interesting story behind it. YOU'LL ENJOY IT.
annotated_sentences.comment: Woj: really good has to be a separate entry 2 to tell difference from good 1
